name: TheLaughingTherapy
description:
Many children have to spend way too much time of their young lifes in a hospital. That's no fun at all =(

Luckily there are many people, trying to help as best as they can.

You are one of them. 
A CliniClown, a hero for the little fellows!

You help the kids forget their hardships for some time and bring them joy.

Thank you! 

PS: Consider donating to your local heros =)
If anyone should donate something for the game here on itch.io, I will donate everything to https://cliniclowns.at

----------------------------------------------------------------

My first game jam participation. Done within 4 days.
